```{r tabsglt2end, cache=cacheon}

sglt2end <- pdata %>% 
  filter(ddr_sglt2_end != "No") %>% 
  count(ddr_sglt2_end) %>% 
  mutate(pro = dF(n/ sum(n) * 100, 1),
         np = paste0(n, " (", pro, "%)")) %>%
  select(ddr_sglt2_end, np)

colnames(sglt2end) <- c("Last SGLT2 dispension during 2018", "n (%)")

mykable(sglt2end,
  caption = "SGLT2 at end of study", scale_down = FALSE
)
```
